title: (x) Who designed the typeface "Popular"? - Christian Schwartz {Mike Solita (self)}
content:
Trying to find it to purchase. Not having much luck. (Not Popular Cafe. Just “Popular”.)

any assistance would be appreciated.

 [‹ Sans caps on "Motor Comptoir Zurich 1932" vintage poster by Otto Baumberger](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203251/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50067 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mad Libs logo bouncy casual slab serif caps ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203251/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50321 "Go to next forum topic")
author: solita

comments.content: Nah .. actually I found the designer, Christian Schwartz, but it doesn’t seem to be for sale publicly.
